# See https://github.com/build-cpp/cmkr for more information

# Create a configure-time dependency on cmake.toml to improve IDE support
if(CMKR_ROOT_PROJECT)
	configure_file(cmake.toml cmake.toml COPYONLY)
endif()

# Options
option(LIEF_EXAMPLES "" OFF)
option(LIEF_USE_CCACHE "" OFF)
option(LIEF_ENABLE_JSON "" OFF)
option(LIEF_TESTS "" OFF)
option(ZASM_BUILD_TESTS "" OFF)
option(ZASM_BUILD_BENCHMARKS "" OFF)

include(FetchContent)

message(STATUS "Fetching LIEF (ddbf40f)...")
FetchContent_Declare(LIEF
	GIT_REPOSITORY
		"https://github.com/lief-project/LIEF.git"
	GIT_TAG
		ddbf40f
)
FetchContent_MakeAvailable(LIEF)

message(STATUS "Fetching zasm (fb8b7357cb674f3c29a17ed2444a6355607bdef4)...")
FetchContent_Declare(zasm
	GIT_REPOSITORY
		"https://github.com/zyantific/zasm.git"
	GIT_TAG
		fb8b7357cb674f3c29a17ed2444a6355607bdef4
)
FetchContent_MakeAvailable(zasm)
